name: Synthesis and Characterization of Biodegradable Polymers from Starch
description: Investigating the preparation of eco-friendly biodegradable plastics using starch-based raw materials and analyzing their mechanical properties.

name: Water Quality Assessment of Local Wells and Boreholes
description: Analyzing the chemical and microbial composition of groundwater samples to evaluate their suitability for human consumption.

name: Production of Bioethanol from Agricultural Waste
description: Developing a sustainable process for generating bioethanol from cassava peels and corn husks as renewable energy sources.

name: Extraction and Quantification of Essential Oils from Lemon Grass
description: Studying the extraction efficiency and chemical composition of essential oils obtained from Cymbopogon citratus using steam distillation.

name: Corrosion Inhibition Studies on Mild Steel Using Natural Plant Extracts
description: Examining the effectiveness of plant-derived inhibitors in preventing corrosion in acidic environments.

name: Phytochemical Screening of Medicinal Plants for Antibacterial Compounds
description: Identifying and testing the active compounds in selected local herbs for antibacterial properties.

name: Synthesis and Spectroscopic Analysis of Metal Complexes of Schiff Bases
description: Preparing transition metal complexes from Schiff bases and characterizing them using IR, UV, and NMR spectroscopy.

name: Determination of Heavy Metals in Locally Processed Foods
description: Analyzing lead, cadmium, and arsenic levels in canned and packaged food products using atomic absorption spectroscopy.

name: Comparative Study of Detergent Formulations Using Local Materials
description: Developing and evaluating detergent products using locally available surfactants and fillers.

name: Analysis of Vitamin C Content in Fruits During Ripening
description: Measuring the variation of ascorbic acid concentration in fruits at different stages of maturity.

name: Preparation of Activated Carbon from Coconut Shells
description: Producing and characterizing activated carbon derived from coconut shells for water purification applications.

name: Kinetics of the Iodine Clock Reaction
description: Investigating the rate law and activation energy of the iodine clock reaction under various conditions.

name: Chemical Composition Analysis of Local Soaps
description: Comparing the saponification values and fatty acid profiles of locally made and commercial soaps.

name: Extraction and Characterization of Natural Dyes from Hibiscus Flowers
description: Developing a natural dye from hibiscus petals and testing its colorfastness on textile materials.

name: Comparative Study of Fuel Properties of Biodiesel from Various Oils
description: Producing biodiesel from different vegetable oils and comparing viscosity, flash point, and energy output.

name: Determination of pH and Buffer Capacity of Local Soft Drinks
description: Analyzing the acidity and buffering ability of different soft drink brands to understand their chemical balance.

name: Study of the Effects of Temperature on Enzyme Catalysis
description: Investigating the influence of temperature on enzyme activity using catalase as a model enzyme.

name: Quantitative Determination of Caffeine in Beverages
description: Using UV spectroscopy to estimate caffeine concentrations in coffee, tea, and energy drinks.

name: Synthesis of Aspirin from Salicylic Acid
description: Preparing acetylsalicylic acid in the laboratory and analyzing its purity using melting point and titration methods.

name: Determination of Hardness in Water Samples from Different Sources
description: Titrimetric analysis of calcium and magnesium ions in tap, borehole, and rainwater samples.

name: Comparative Analysis of Local and Imported Fertilizers
description: Determining the nutrient content and quality differences between local and imported NPK fertilizers.

name: Study of the Effects of Acid Rain on Building Materials
description: Simulating acid rain conditions to evaluate the degradation rate of marble, concrete, and limestone.

name: Extraction of Natural Flavor Compounds from Citrus Peels
description: Isolating and analyzing limonene and related terpenes from orange and lemon peels.

name: Determination of Alcohol Content in Local Beverages
description: Analyzing ethanol concentration in palm wine and other local brews using distillation and density measurement.

name: Production and Analysis of Soap Using Plant Ash as Alkali Source
description: Investigating the saponification potential of alkaline extracts from plant ashes in soap production.

name: Investigation of the Effect of Catalysts on Esterification Reactions
description: Studying how different acid catalysts influence the yield and rate of ester formation.

name: Assessment of Air Quality in Urban Areas
description: Measuring pollutant concentrations like CO, NO2, and SO2 in high-traffic areas using chemical sensors.

name: Preparation of Alum from Waste Aluminum Cans
description: Recycling aluminum cans through chemical conversion into alum for educational and industrial purposes.

name: Chemical Analysis of Local Honey Samples
description: Investigating the sugar profile, moisture content, and pH of honey collected from different regions.

name: Comparative Study of Bleaching Agents on Fabric
description: Analyzing the bleaching effectiveness and damage caused by chlorine and hydrogen peroxide on cotton fabrics.

name: Study of Adsorption of Dyes Using Natural Clays
description: Evaluating the adsorption capacity of bentonite and kaolin clays for dye removal from wastewater.

name: Determination of Fatty Acid Composition of Edible Oils
description: Using GC-MS to analyze fatty acid content in groundnut, palm, and olive oils.

name: Chemical Kinetics of the Decomposition of Hydrogen Peroxide
description: Determining the rate constant and activation energy for hydrogen peroxide decomposition catalyzed by MnO2.

name: Evaluation of the Quality of Drinking Water Stored in Plastic Containers
description: Studying how prolonged storage in plastic affects the chemical and physical quality of drinking water.

name: Extraction of Natural Pigments from Spinach Leaves
description: Isolating chlorophyll pigments and analyzing their stability under different light and temperature conditions.

name: Study of Acid-Base Indicators from Natural Sources
description: Developing eco-friendly pH indicators from plant extracts such as hibiscus and beetroot.

name: Chemical Analysis of Ash Content in Various Wood Samples
description: Determining the mineral content of ashes obtained from different wood types through gravimetric analysis.

name: Determination of Sulphate and Nitrate Ions in Rainwater
description: Analyzing atmospheric deposition of pollutants by titration and spectrophotometric methods.

name: Production of Biochar from Agricultural Residues
description: Developing carbon-rich biochar materials for soil enhancement and pollutant adsorption.

name: Study of Chemical Oxygen Demand (COD) in Wastewater Samples
description: Determining organic load in wastewater using dichromate oxidation techniques.

name: Evaluation of Antioxidant Properties of Local Fruits
description: Measuring the total phenolic content and antioxidant capacity of mango, guava, and pineapple extracts.

name: Synthesis of Silver Nanoparticles Using Plant Extracts
description: Green synthesis of silver nanoparticles and analysis of their antimicrobial activity.

name: Determination of Lead Content in Paint Samples
description: Measuring lead concentration in paints using atomic absorption spectrophotometry to assess safety compliance.

name: Study of Free Radical Scavenging Activity in Herbal Teas
description: Comparing the antioxidant effects of green tea and locally blended herbal teas.

name: Chemical Analysis of Household Cleaning Agents
description: Evaluating the concentration of active ingredients and pH in popular household cleaners.

name: Determination of Salinity Levels in Irrigation Water
description: Assessing the electrical conductivity and ionic composition of irrigation water samples.

name: Extraction and Characterization of Natural Coagulants from Moringa Seeds
description: Studying the efficiency of moringa seed extract in purifying turbid water samples.

name: Study of the Chemical Stability of Vitamin C in Stored Juices
description: Monitoring the degradation of ascorbic acid in fruit juices under different storage conditions.

name: Formulation and Quality Evaluation of Hand Sanitizers
description: Developing alcohol-based hand sanitizers and testing their antibacterial effectiveness.

name: Investigation of the Effect of Heat on Milk Composition
description: Analyzing the chemical changes in milk proteins and fats upon heating and pasteurization.

name: Analysis of the Chemical Constituents of Local Palm Oil
description: Determining the fatty acid composition, iodine value, and free fatty acid content of palm oil samples from different regions.

name: Synthesis of Biodiesel Using Waste Cooking Oil and Heterogeneous Catalysts
description: Developing a green process for converting waste cooking oil into biodiesel using solid catalysts to enhance reusability.

name: Determination of Fluoride Concentration in Drinking Water
description: Measuring fluoride levels in public water supplies to evaluate their compliance with WHO standards.

name: Comparative Analysis of the Efficiency of Natural and Synthetic Preservatives
description: Testing the shelf life and microbial stability of fruit juices preserved with natural and artificial additives.

name: Study of Electroplating of Copper on Iron Surfaces
description: Investigating parameters that affect the uniformity and adhesion of copper coatings during electroplating.

name: Determination of Chemical Oxygen Demand and Biological Oxygen Demand in River Water
description: Assessing the level of organic pollution in river water by comparing COD and BOD values.

name: Extraction and Quantification of Caffeine from Tea Leaves
description: Using solvent extraction and spectrophotometric analysis to determine caffeine content in different brands of tea.

name: Comparative Study of Local and Imported Cement on Setting Time and Composition
description: Analyzing chemical composition and hydration rate differences between various cement brands.

name: Chemical Analysis of Different Brands of Bottled Water
description: Evaluating the ionic composition, total dissolved solids, and pH of bottled water brands available locally.

name: Study of the Effect of Light on the Stability of Drugs
description: Investigating photodegradation of commonly used pharmaceutical tablets under various lighting conditions.

name: Preparation and Characterization of Zeolites from Clay
description: Synthesizing zeolitic materials from natural clays and analyzing their adsorption capacity.

name: Determination of Phosphate Levels in Agricultural Runoff
description: Measuring the concentration of phosphates in soil leachates to evaluate nutrient pollution.

name: Isolation of Natural Rubber from Latex
description: Processing raw latex to obtain natural rubber and determining its physical and chemical properties.

name: Spectrophotometric Determination of Iron in Food Samples
description: Estimating the iron content in fortified cereals and vegetables using UV-Vis spectroscopy.

name: Chemical Characterization of Local Clay for Industrial Use
description: Analyzing chemical composition, pH, and cation exchange capacity of local clay deposits.

name: Investigation of Antimicrobial Activity of Silver Nanoparticles
description: Synthesizing silver nanoparticles and evaluating their inhibitory effects on common bacteria.

name: Comparative Study of the Efficiency of Natural Coagulants in Water Treatment
description: Testing coagulants like Moringa seed extract and alum for turbidity removal efficiency.

name: Determination of Vitamin D Levels in Milk Samples
description: Quantifying vitamin D concentration in milk using chromatographic techniques.

name: Assessment of Chemical Contaminants in Street Food
description: Evaluating heavy metal and preservative levels in street-vended snacks for food safety assessment.

name: Thermochemical Analysis of Biomass Combustion
description: Studying heat of combustion and ash content of biomass materials like sawdust and rice husk.

name: Synthesis and Characterization of Aspirin Derivatives
description: Creating and analyzing structural analogs of aspirin for improved pharmacological performance.

name: Chemical Analysis of Drinking Water from Plastic and Glass Containers
description: Comparing leaching effects and chemical stability of water stored in different packaging materials.

name: Determination of Iodine Value of Edible Oils
description: Evaluating the degree of unsaturation in various edible oils using titrimetric analysis.

name: Analysis of the Effect of Temperature on Solubility of Salts
description: Investigating how temperature affects solubility of ionic compounds in aqueous solutions.

name: Extraction of Alkaloids from Bitter Leaf (Vernonia amygdalina)
description: Isolating and quantifying alkaloid content in bitter leaf extracts using acid-base extraction techniques.

name: Determination of Sulphur Content in Diesel Fuels
description: Analyzing sulfur levels in local diesel samples to check compliance with emission standards.

name: Preparation and Characterization of Soap Using Shea Butter
description: Developing shea butter-based soap and evaluating its pH, foaming ability, and hardness.

name: Kinetic Study of Saponification of Ethyl Acetate
description: Determining rate constants and reaction order for the hydrolysis of ethyl acetate under basic conditions.

name: Determination of Moisture Content and Ash in Food Samples
description: Analyzing the nutritional composition of local food items through gravimetric techniques.

name: Synthesis and Characterization of Coordination Complexes of Nickel
description: Preparing and analyzing Ni(II) complexes with nitrogen-oxygen donor ligands using IR and UV spectroscopy.

name: Study of Adsorption of Heavy Metals Using Banana Peel
description: Using dried banana peel as a low-cost biosorbent for removal of lead and cadmium from wastewater.

name: Determination of Formaldehyde in Building Materials
description: Measuring formaldehyde emission levels in wood-based products using spectrophotometry.

name: Comparative Study of Different Antacids
description: Evaluating neutralizing capacity, pH, and reaction time of various commercial antacid brands.

name: Analysis of Sodium Chloride Content in Packaged Foods
description: Determining salt levels in processed food to assess dietary sodium intake risks.

name: Study of Enthalpy Changes in Neutralization Reactions
description: Measuring heat changes during acid-base neutralization using calorimetry.

name: Extraction and Characterization of Pectin from Orange Peels
description: Producing natural pectin and analyzing its gelation properties for food and pharmaceutical use.
